title: Trump Celebrates Melania's Birthday by Ranting on "Fox & Friends" | James Forman Jr.
itunes:title: Trump Celebrates Melania's Birthday by Ranting on "Fox & Friends" | James Forman Jr.
description:
Kim Jong-un takes a page from the Trump playbook, President Trump goes on an epic rant on "Fox & Friends," and author James Forman Jr. discusses "Locking Up Our Own."
